phrases: This is the wood of the cross on which hung the Saviour of the world...
After years of research I found out that
the best place to connect Gehenna and Assiah is here,
at the top of the True Cross Academy that Mephisto founded.
but the quality of the blood we had collected was too low.
We could not summon the Gehenna Gate with impure blood.
However, if we were to add Rin's blood, it would change everything.
A mere 5 litres would greatly increase the purity
and allow us to summon a giant Gehenna Gate.
Even if you drained all of his blood, it would not be enough!
That would be true for a human.
Extreme blood loss is no problem with his demonic regeneration.
Rin will be remembered as a hero by the generations to come,
a martyr who died protecting Assiah!
Let my brother go right now!
It is pointless to shoot me.
The plane carrying the Messiah warhead has already departed from the Dragoon Laboratory.
Soon it will pass over the True Cross Academy.
The plane takes orders only from me.
If we do not open the Gehenna Gate, the Messiah will hit the Academy.
We have already passed the point of no return.
I will open the Gehenna Gate,
Is even this according to your plans, Brother?
Those brothers are like two sides of a mirror.
Had he not drawn the Demon-Slaying Blade that day,
their fates would have been different.
What will be left after the chaos passes?
Even I am excited to see the outcome!
This is the wood of the cross on which hung the Saviour of the world.
Ye people: what have I made you?
or in what have I offended you?
Great, the power really grows exponentially if the twin's blood gets mixed in!
That is the young prof, are not it?
Yuki told me he had no demonic powers...
Then what are those blue flames?
Let us burn Gehenna with the flames of science!
Then the fifth angel blew his trumpet
a star that had fallen to earth from the sky
and he was given the key to the shaft of the bottomless pit.
When he opened it, smoke poured out as though from a huge furnace,
and the sunlight and air turned dark from the smoke.
Behold, this is the light of man's wisdom!
It is the proof of our victory, the shine of Jacob's Ladder!
Then locusts came from the smoke and descended on the earth,
and they were given power to sting like scorpions.
Their king is the angel from the bottomless pit
his name in Hebrew is Abaddon, and in Greek, Apollyon - the Destroyer.
We have got to get away!
Looks like it was a failure.
As if you could even scratch Gehenna with a tiny spark like that.
Do not imitate Father's voice to try and lead me astray!
He was the last person I possessed, so even my voice is like his now.
If you had never troubled Assiah, Father would not have died,
and Mother would not have been killed either!
Do not look like you do not get it.
Let me show you, through my own fucking eyes.
I was looking for you, Yuri!
Why are you living in this forest all alone?
You are causing so damn much trouble!
We are going back to the Vatican.
This hobgoblin smells like sunshine again.
I am not going back to the Vatican.
Do you know what people are calling you?
You are supposed to be an Exorcist.
You should not get any more buddy-buddy with demons.
You are turning it into a mess because you think of humans and demons separately!
They are my important friends, you know!
We cannot allow someone from the famed Egin family of the Vatican to be associated with demons.
These demons are just tricking you!
We will wipe out all of them!
That is the purpose of Exorcists!
Since when is that monster in Assiah?
I was dispatched to this area to investigate spontaneous human combustion cases.
It seems I could tolerate those flames.
The Order of the True Cross ordered me to return,
but I stayed in the forest.
I wanted to talk to those flames again.
Do you know who I am?
Or I will kill you too!
If that is what you want...
I could hear your voice back then.
Everything I touch in Assiah burns to ashes.
No matter how much you love something, it just turns into ashes in your hands.
If you really feel like that, just use my body.
Poor little one, it fell from the nest.
It means its life is gone.
every bug and flower and bird, and even humans,
everything has just one of it.
Every single life is different and unique.
You cannot just buy or give life.
His children are growing within me.
You have your desires like everyone else, but she is the daughter of the Cardinal...
Yuri is possessed by a demon!
And it is not just any normal demon!
It is the Demon King Satan!
You were the only one to visit her there.
We will listen to your excuses in court.
That is banned by the Vatican itself.
Are you telling me to let her bear them?
I will give birth to them and raise them.
is it true that you carry the children of a demon?
Demons often pull pranks and scare humans,
but that just shows how curious they are.
We should learn to love each other.
I will now deliver the sentence.
Accused Yuri Egin is determined guilty, and sentenced to death!
To save Yuri, I looked for a vessel for myself,
but my power was too great.
No one had a body strong enough to endure my presence.
Who will protect Assiah if we fall?!
This body will not last long.
He came to take back his wife and children.
The Exorcists who could become his vessel have been turned into sacrifices.
You are the only Exorcist capable of action in the Vatican.
Yuri Egin escaped with help from Satan.
The Kurikara, a demon sword with the power of the Holy Unmovable.
It may come handy to kill the children of Satan.
The one with the blue flames is Rin.
They will prove that demons and humans can understand each other.
The Vatican ordered you to kill the children together with their mother.
The woman died by herself though.
With demonic powers, life would be suffering for them.
I thought you were going to slay them.
Though I came here to kill them...
You are turning it into a mess because you think of humans and demons separately!
I will raise them well as human kids!
You, feared for your cold-heartedness, raising the children of a demon?
Then how about making a gamble with me?
If you can raise them as humans, you win.
If they awaken to their demonic powers, I win,
Then let me help you a little.
I have sealed the demonic power in this sword.
There is no reason for the gamble if he is always covered in blue flames.
Now I shall report back to the Vatican that we finished the demon's children.
What I have showed you is merely the truth.
If you think I lied, ask your precious Pope who is sinking over there.
Did you order Mother... Yuri Egin to be burnt?!
That thing said she would give birth to a demon's offspring!
Human children are one thing, but a demon's?
Yuri was already dead to me.
She died the day she gave birth to you demonic filth!
Your existence itself is a stain on the Egin name!
Finally, I have got the perfect vessel.
You have my blood as well.
I can feel every inch of you as my own!
Let us throw a feast to celebrate the descent of your lord Satan!
No Gehenna and no Assiah, a single world where demons and humans can live together.
Close your eyes and try to imagine it.
It is alright kokoro ni mo nai
sakete toorenai michi wa itsu kara ka konna datta
haite suteru hodo ni taikutsu datta
kizu darake ni natte try for pride
haite sutete mo kekkyoku taisetsu nanda
harewatari michi ni hikari wa sashita
Let us fight osore wa nai
Dark side in my heart is
the unerasable sadness of the past.
It is alright if I do not really mean it,
so I fire my blasters and stretch out my hands.
Since when has my way been unavoidable like this?
And now there is no one left...
I cry for my pride, I cannot bear it.
Ah, ah, ah, alone in my world.
An aria of love resounding through
this distorted reality of twisted prayers.
My dreams and tomorrow are collapsing,
because throwing away the lies would be boring.
try it for your pride, covered in wounds.
Ah, ah, ah, alone in my world.
Even so, I sing the song of love and
let its wish reach through this distorted world
to build our bonds and the tomorrow to come.
Throwing away the lies was important after all,
because this is my precious life.
Dark cloud in my heart is
disappearing and light is shining on the road I am on.
Let us fight, there is no fear.
mau chou no you ni hirari
koko wa dokoka betsu no sekai
juudaina ayamachi ni mo kizukazu ni
hito kara hito e to tsunagaru
totemo kirei de maru de kinu no ito
kore ga unmei to iu kusari nano ka
I am lightly fluttering in wondrous light
like a dancing butterfly in midair.
Is this place in another world?
My fall is not slowing down so
The numbers that make my head spin
and there I notice a terrible error.
is a shining pale indigo blue wire.
It is beautiful like a thread of silk.
I wonder if it is what they call the chains of fate?
You seek for it and yet you are already caught,
so do not try to struggle.
You are a beautiful fool in
the way you get entwined in this
You seek for it and yet you are already caught,
so do not try to struggle.
You are a beautiful fool in
the way you get entwined in it.
